item.title: Ascensia ContourUSB Python driver
item.description: Introduction I have used numerous glucose meters the last 20 years, but only lately I found interest in exporting statistics about my blood glucose levels. Most of the models provide a proprietary exporting tool that is AFAIK only for Windows. However, down to the connection interface level, all those device use either USB or Serial connection. This fact led to the development of many libraries meant to interface and provide data export functionality for a number of devices, regardless of the underlying operating system.
